name: fake-news-generator
description: Streaming AI demo that generates fake news headlines

scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace backend dev" "yarn workspace frontend dev"
scripts.build: yarn workspace backend build && yarn workspace frontend build
scripts.test: yarn workspace backend test && yarn workspace frontend test
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace backend build && tsc --project frontend/tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.lint: yarn workspace backend lint && yarn workspace frontend lint
scripts.validate: yarn typecheck && yarn lint && yarn test
